meta.label: NBM Analysis
meta.description: AI-powered sales call analysis using 3 Whys and MEDDIC frameworks

params.name: llm_id
params.label: LLM ID
params.description: The ID of the Dataiku LLM to use for analysis (e.g., 'my-claude-llm')

params.name: results_dataset

params.description: Dataset to log all analysis results (will be created if doesn't exist)
